title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 105.4 - Exclusions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 105.4 - Exclusions

State Regulations
(a) Excluded from
these regulations are: (1)
advertising
devices which are not visible from any traveled portion of the Thruway
system; (2)
advertising devices for
which the attraction is deemed incidental by the Thruway Authority; (3)
directional or other official signs and
signals erected or maintained by the State or other public agency having
jurisdiction; and
(4)
information
required or authorized by law to be posted or displayed thereon. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
105.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
